c:functionType.name: UserSelectionAction
c:functionType.c:documentation: A callback function that is called when the user performs a selection, but before the corresponding datums' selected state is actually changed.

c:argument.name: selectingDatums
c:argument.c:documentation: An array with the datums that will be selected by the current operation.

c:argument.name: selectingGroup
c:argument.c:documentation: A data group, if the current operation will only select a single group, otherwise no value.

c:returns.c:documentation: The datums that should be actually selected.
